blockDurationMinutes.description: The required duration in minutes. This value must be a multiple of 60.

instanceInterruptionBehavior.description:
The behavior when a Spot Instance is interrupted. Can be `hibernate`,
`stop`, or `terminate`. (Default: `terminate`).

maxPrice.description: The maximum hourly price you're willing to pay for the Spot Instances.

spotInstanceType.description: The Spot Instance request type. Can be `one-time`, or `persistent`.

validUntil.description: The end date of the request.
